website_summaries.verdict: An affordable lever-operated model for those who prefer the traditional style.
pros: Dual-position standard lever model that is flexible for use in numerous applications
Comes at the lower end of the price spectrum
cons: It's leaky and not as easy to operate as some other models

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend finding another grease gun to buy.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Bought it for the low cost, should have known better. Leaks from every conceivable joint. See the picture attached. Not recommended, buy with the certain understanding that you will be disappointed with your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BoatCamperTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Works great, good price.
customer_reviews.text: I got this trust standard lever action grease gun to replace my air grease gun that I was suspicious of ever having worked properly. This is like teh one my dad used religiously and there's a good reason for it: IT WORKS! I'm very happy with it and have already used it for a couple jobs. No leaks yet, I'm curious what it will be like in time, but I don't have a crystal ball. So I'll stick with being pleased with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R. Pokorny Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great Price Great Little Grease gun!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Was a little leery of quality due to low price but it was way above what I expected or dreaded after reading some of the reviews. I have no issues, no leaking connections anywhere. Very satisfied with this item!!!
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Well built. I know it’s only a grease gun but this one is a good value for your money. It is made of thick metal and has a string spring. The pump is smooth and pumps the same amount with each stroke so you and try to avoided wasting grease.
customer_reviews.author: Todd & Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Not super
customer_reviews.text: The nozzle is not quick connect but not quick disconnect. You have to manually unscrew it to get it off the zerk fitting. Not super awesome
customer_reviews.author: Sequoia Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Good valve and durable
customer_reviews.text: OK, so catching up on reviews I stuck this guy in my jeep because I was doing a lot of wheeling and grease is important. Anyway, if you have a problem interchanging parts just use vice grips and make it easy on yourself. This was a great buy for me because no matter how well made they look at the autoparts store they always fail.
customer_reviews.author: LFamily

customer_reviews.title: Best Grease Gun!
customer_reviews.text: Love precision tools like this grease gun. Delivers high pressure and high volume. Great for keeping boat trailer bearings in tact. My boat mechanic said trailer bearings should be pumped with grease after every four uses if using in salt water envrionment.
customer_reviews.author: CMack

customer_reviews.title: Have two, they  work perfect.
customer_reviews.text: So far this really pumps the lube out without leaks and is keeping it's prime. second one I've bought (two different greases.) Great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Groovy

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Used almost an entire tube of grease the first time I tried it out because I put bearing buddies on my trailer. No issues or leaks.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: The nozzle threads were poorly manufactured and do not seat ...
customer_reviews.text: The nozzle threads were poorly manufactured and do not seat strait inside the gun. I will look for alternatives, but currently I am not able to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Spittell

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well and does its job. However tends to leak slightly even when pressure is let off tube.
customer_reviews.author: Janell Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great grease gun. Works as it should. Will be using it a long time. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: NathanHale

customer_reviews.title: Nice simple grease gun.
customer_reviews.text: Nice simple grease gun. Using this a few times a year for my John Deere tractor, works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jason T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality grease gun, but you will probably have to loosen tip so it will let go of fitting.
customer_reviews.author: The 1

customer_reviews.title: Great grease gun unless you are in a tight space
customer_reviews.text: Grease gun worked fine, except that I tried to remove the coupling from the metal extension and it would not come off. The metal extension started to bend when tring to remove it. I really needed to put a flexible extension on to reach tight spots under the car.
customer_reviews.author: Daddo

customer_reviews.title: Not great!
customer_reviews.text: I have had issues with the tool not releasing from the grease fitting. It locks on and requires so much force I have broken three fittings off.
customer_reviews.author: jdr

customer_reviews.title: I would of given it a worse review, but I want to try a new ...
customer_reviews.text: Quit pumping grease after a month. I would of given it a worse review, but I want to try a new tube of grease first.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Jansma

customer_reviews.title: Grat grease gun for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with this purchase. Well built, easy to load and to use. Much better than my old one which failed.
customer_reviews.author: Herb fm Kingston

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding price for basic grease gun
customer_reviews.text: Only used it for a short time but impressed so far with the quality and especially at such a reasonable price. Bleed valve is great.
customer_reviews.author: Lotusguy

customer_reviews.title: and this one really works nicely. I would recommend this to a friend
customer_reviews.text: I've been using cheaper grease guns, and this one really works nicely. I would recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: nashville_bill

customer_reviews.title: Good Grease Gun
customer_reviews.text: Well designed, has spring-loaded fitting to bleed air and works well. Pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ama_zon_47

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A good item; it primed up well and works great. No leaks.
customer_reviews.author: William H. Hartzler III

customer_reviews.title: Glad I did
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool for the price. Built and works well. Should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: rsky

customer_reviews.title: Very nice affordable grease gun
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a nice gun! Attaches and detaches very easily, and instructions were easy peasy.
customer_reviews.author: Jon S

customer_reviews.title: ... a chance to use it yet but it looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a chance to use it yet but it looks good.
customer_reviews.author: D. Silver

customer_reviews.title: I like the grease gun
customer_reviews.text: I like the grease gun, but amazon FAILED with their additional items bought with this product. I thought I was buying a tube of grease that fit the gun, but it was 1/2 the size i needed. Not sure why amazon thought I needed to pair a large grease gun with a mini tube of grease.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Well made and great price
customer_reviews.text: I did some research before choosing this to help lubricate the parts of my car I can lubricate. I'm glad I chose this one, it has been good to use and feels sturdy, like it will last quite a while if it's taken care of.
customer_reviews.author: H. Khalsa

customer_reviews.title: This grease gun works as expected. I used it ...
customer_reviews.text: This grease gun works as expected. I used it for a dump cart on the back of my lawn mower. My only problem was figuring out how to detach the gun after using it, but that was based on my inexperience - not the gun's fault. Five minutes on Youtube and I figured that out. Can't go wrong for the price.
customer_reviews.author: GregA

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Does not come with 18" hose. this was the only reason I purchased this one.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin G.

product_meta.title: GreaseTek Standard Lever Grease Gun with Extension Pipe
product_meta.description: GreaseTek Lever Grease Gun is a standard lever-action grease gun with an array of features. The advanced priming gasket allows for easy priming. Knurled barrel prevents slippage. Includes bleeder valve and bulk filer valve. Dual-positioning grease loader allows for multiple positions of use. Package includes curved extension pipe with coupler. 400c.c. Delivers: 1oz./ 40 strokes
feature_bullets: Improved plunger design for easy priming and loading; 400c.c. Delivers: 1oz./ 40 strokes
Includes curved extension pipe with coupler
Lever-action handle and knurled barrel increase grip
Includes bleeder valve and bulk filer valve
Dual-positioning grease loader for multiple positions

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars104 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
